name: #FiebreDeSeguidores
description:
A game made in 48 hour at the Escuela Da vinci game jam.
A one minute arcade style game where you collect food to take pictures of them and upload them on social media to get followers and avoid trolls and haters.

10000 followers are needed to get the good ending.

Cast:

Art: Facundo Avendaño, Walter Nicolás Gonzalez (Waltz_89)
Programming: Mateo Perugorría.
